name: veloqrs
description: Native Rust-powered route matching for Expo/React Native
author: Evan Thomas <evan@evanjt.com>

scripts.generate:android: npx uniffi-bindgen-react-native build android --release --and-generate --targets ${VELOQ_ANDROID_TARGET:-arm64-v8a} && npm run fix-includes
scripts.generate:android:all: npx uniffi-bindgen-react-native build android --release --and-generate && npm run fix-includes
scripts.generate:ios: npx uniffi-bindgen-react-native build ios --release --and-generate --targets ${VELOQ_IOS_TARGET:-aarch64-apple-ios-sim} && npm run fix-includes
scripts.generate:ios:all: npx uniffi-bindgen-react-native build ios --release --and-generate && npm run fix-includes
